findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability
findings.description: Relying on other contracts might cause Reentrancy Vulnerability.

findings.title: Unnecessary use of require statement
findings.description: The use of require statement will only consume more gas, as an owner can instruct to not use 0 as a value while locking to waste Gas.

findings.title: Does not use the value returned by external calls
findings.description: The return value is not used when a function is returning a value.
